Name: Reindeer Lichen Host Tree
SaplingDescription: Takes 28 days to produce a pine tree capable of supporting Reindeer Lichen. Bears "fruit" in the winter. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

SaplingDescriptionLocalization.zh: 需要 28 天才能生产出能够支撑石蕊的松树。 在冬天结出“果实”。 只有在附近 8 个“地块”为空时才会成长。
